item.description:
@tylur wrote:

Well this is an older thread that I had made, but the owner recently had added a new shops location +redone whole shops. Added a new donator Island.

He added bork, skyrkeworms or whatever they are, Daganoth Kings, Dungeonering minigame, a lot of new stuff has been updated today. I just showed some of the general things.
